Articles.Content:
Probably not the best place for this... if it isn't, simply move it (if you're a moderator), or let me know (if you are NOT a moderator)

Terrier Space Enterprises

I am assuming a lot of you have heard of SpaceX? I'm assuming so because they are a major player in the board game "Space: Trying to Get to Mars Alive" game. Well, first, a bit of a backstory. Around early December 2017, I was browsing reddit and came across this really cool thing called a "year in review," whatever that is. (self explanatory, lol) Apparently, it is for something called "Kerbal Space Agency" with the domain of kerbalspace.agency. Inspiration time! I quickly set up a weebly website for my own similar setup, Terrier Space Enterprises. I like to associate it with SpaceX in everything but that Tesla to Mars "goal" and the reusability.

Website

Right, with that out of the way, which was about all I had to say about TSE, I actually have a website for this!

https://terrierspaceenterprises.weebly.com/

That's it. There. Weebly is cool sometimes.
